description: Loop Hike in Shenandoah National Park's Central Section to the site of Herbert Hoover's Presidential Camp.  Includes a section of the Appalachian Trail.  Trail head is just south of Big Meadows Campground.
directions: Take Skyline Drive to Milam Gap Parking Area, located about 3 miles south of Big Meadows Campground.
title: Hoover Camp Loop
